create table `system_${tableName}` ( `id` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `aid` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '主表ID', `ext01` varchar(32), `ext02` varchar(32), `ext03` varchar(32), `ext04` varchar(32), `ext05` varchar(32), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

select
from system_forms where 1 = 1 order by update_time desc
